DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Four Popular Diet Strategies Weight Loss Cardiac Risk Reduction
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To assess adherence rate effectiveness 4 popular diet ( Atkins , Zone , Weight Watchers , Ornish ) weight loss cardiac risk factor reduction . Design , Setting , Participants : A single-center randomized trial academic medical center Boston , Mass , overweight obese adult know hypertension , dyslipidemia , fast hyperglycemia . Participants enrol start July 18 , 2000 , randomize 4 popular diet group January 24 , 2002 . Intervention : A total 160 participant randomly assign either Atkins ( carbohydrate restriction , n=40 ) , Zone ( macronutrient balance , n=40 ) , Weight Watchers ( calorie restriction , n=40 ) , Ornish ( fat restriction , n=40 ) diet group . After 2 month maximum effort , participant select level dietary adherence . Main Outcome Measures : One-year change baseline weight cardiac risk factor , self-selected dietary adherence rate per self-report . Outcome measure include body weight , total cholesterol , LDL-C , HDL-C , triglyceride , hsCRP , insulin , glucose .
DOC.criteria: BMI 2742 ; At least one metabolic cardiac risk factor Age 18 year ; Insulin therapy ; Unstable chronic illness ; Unwilling follow dietary advice
